title: Bandits: Phoenix Rising [ENG][ISO][v1.1.1]
description:
Bandits: Phoenix Rising by Grin

Post-apocalyptic Action/Racing game released in 2003 for PC/Windows.

Torrent includes:
  Cd image containing installation files (plus a crack for 1.0 version)
  Patch to update game to 1.1.1 version
  Spoof cd image to run the game without crack (requires Daemon Tools or Alcohol %120)

Should install fine on modern Windows versions, audio from the intro movie was missing for me however. I'll post a comment if I find a fix for it
